thing-type.label: TZ68 Wall Plug
thing-type.description: Wall Plug<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe TKB TZ68 is a switch plug that can be placed between a wall outlet and electric devices, plugged in by cord. It can switch all loads up to 3500 W. The device is IP 20 rated and can therefore only be used in dry environments.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo confirm Inclusion hit the button on the device.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo confirm Exclusion hit the button on the device.</p&gt
